Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseSongView
    this class is responsible for creating the view that lets the user choose the song want to play.
    DialogBoxView
    Class for displaying a pop up with an informative message to the user
    FriendView
    This class creates a view that allows the user to add friends, displays the user's friends, and select a friend to see their songs.
    GraphMinutesView
    Class for displaying the graph with the amount of total song minutes played
    GraphSongPlayView
    Class for displaying the graph with the amount of total songs played
    GraphView
    Class that manages the creation of both graphs (minutes played and number of plays) uses GraphMinutesView and GraphSongPlayView to create both graphs, and then joins them into one panel
    KeyboardSettingsView
    This class creates the panel that displays which keyboard keys are the ones currently configured to its corresponding note and allows the user the select and change the keys.
    LogInView
    This is a class to create the log in view.
    MainView
    this class is the main view of the client, it contains the main JFrame of the client.
    ManageAccountView
    This is class creates the view for the account management.
    ManageSongView
    This class's main purpose is to display and construct the view for managing the song view it offers methods to initialize the class and to add the content to the panels
    MenuView
    This is a class to create the Menu view.
    PianoKeys
    This class constructs the piano keys view.
    PianoSongsView
    This class corresponds to the screen displayed when the user wants to play a song.
    PlayPianoView
    This class creates the view for the Play Piano functionality.
    RegisterUserView
    This is a class to create the Register view.
    SaveSongDialog
    This class creates a dialog to allow the user to save the song that has just been played.
    TopFiveView
    this class's main purpose is to display and construct the view for the top 5 songs played on the server it offers methods to initialize the class and to add the content to the panels
    UserSongView
    This class is used to display the songs of a specific user's friend.
    ViewUtils  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MainView
    This class' main purpose is to contain all of the information that we reuse across the different views Acts as the "Manager" for all the views.
    MenuView
    This class's main purpose is to display and construct the view for the main menu it offers methods to initialize the class and to add the content to the panels
